subject: REVISED Colour/finish codes
preview: Hey Team,  Have had a few comments that this hasn't been carried out consistently across the site - can we have a review of these codes please?  For example, this was received from the US team:  Hello

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Heath Maguire
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hey Team,

Have had a few comments that this hasn't been carried out consistently across the site - can we have a review of these codes please?

For example, this was received from the US team:

Hello- A customer pointed out to me that the color names are inconsistent on the website, when hovered over- specifically, that Platinum shows as "PEAR 600" (the Pearl color code).

This page is an example: https://acoufelt.com/us/open-office-solutions/

Even on our full color wall panel page I noticed new codes haven't been rolled out consistently across 'Metal', 'Platinum' and 'Natural'

https://acoufelt.com/au/product/colourways/

The colour code for 'natural' is also not consistently being displayed across pages. Just confirming you have this code on file so that you can carry this across the website?

Thanks

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

t +61 1800.62.64.62 ext 310Level 4 108 King William Street Adelaide SA 5000acoufelt.com

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Lucy, 

Just confirming that we have now rolled out all of the colour codes and sampling across the three websites.

Hi Lucy, 

Just an update on this, all product codes have now been updated across the 3 sites. We are just refining the 'order a sample' slide in forms as these are affected by this change too. AU is ready, and US And Global aren't far behind. I'll keep you updated.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hey Heath,

Thanks for this - can you please roll this out for the acoustic art as well - I'd give these their full names plus code afterwards, for example:

For Drew Harrison:

The impostor SH05

Tigers in the attic DH06

Etc.

Let me know if any problems? Ta!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending

full_threads.body:
Hi Lucy, 

Hope you are well. Confirming we have updated the colour codes on the AU site. 

Question, did you want the 'Codes' added to the artwork titles as well? We haven't done any of these as yet FYI.

Hi Lucy, 

Thanks for the Pixel codes and yes, we have started. We are reworking how the colours are setup and assigned based on the growing range. I will be intouch with an update.

Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

Hi Lucy, 

Sure, just letting you know that have received this and will commence working on it early next week and get you an update. 

Speak soon,
@glen kindly work on this one, thanks!

Hey Heath,

Please find attached the revised codes we've created for all of our product colours and finishes.

I have highlghted the relevant codes in yellow. The codes highlighted blue are for products that we are expecting to release over the next few months - but you can ignore the blue ones for now as they aren't on the website.

The only codes that are missing from this list are for Pixel. I'll send these to you hopefully next week.

Could you please have these codes updated on the website in the hover-over function on each of the product pages - as per the below. I'd like codes to be listed as :'Charcoal CH01', 'Cable Blue MO06' etc.

We'll also also probably need these uplaoded and refleted in the sampling function of the website (also see below).

Thanks and let me know if you have any q's?










Warm regards,


Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager
